body:
Comment 8: 
the Type Type doubling bothers me but otherwise ok.
the rfcs say top-level type and subtype.
maybe name the methods TopLevel and Subtype?

separately, what do you do if you want to make
the type for "image/jpeg" with a paramter?
do you have to pick apart "image" and "jpeg" first?
that's kind of lame.

how often do people care about the two halves of
the type?  another possible api is

func BuildType(media string, params map[string]string) Type

func (Type) Media() string
func (Type) Param(name string) string
func (Type) Params() map[string]string
func (Type) String() string

?
